reviews.text: Road should  be cleaned regularly. Algae is sticked to the road and it is slippery. And the wastes should also be cleaned in the corner side. Otherwise it is a great to place swim to have fun.

If you want to see the Indravati river I recommend you to go during sunset .
Believe me you will not regret going there
It is  good and beautiful place earlier but it's not a good place for kids and girls. Now many people were doing alcohol consumption so, it's not safe.

If you want to get out of your hectic day... Then this is the place ... Ride a bike or by a car just for 15-20 mins from Jagdalpur on the way to Chitrakote waterfalls...
Just park your car or bike on the shore remove shoes/ sandals and go for a walk in cold soothing water.. feels relaxed...

Negative point- has a foul smell of water on some  days for which simple solution... Wear a mask...!!😄

places_with_reviews.name: Palli Naka
places_with_reviews.address: 3XWG+J49, Chitrakote Rd, Jagdalpur, Palli, Chhattisgarh 494005, India
